phrs.translation: 通过表示, 由表示, 正在翻译
指称词组, 指谓短语
表示赞成或支持的介词
表示赞成或反对的介词

sentences.sentence: One of the girls wore a cap of two staring colors, denoting the class of persons to which she belonged.
sentences.translation: 其中一个女孩子戴着一顶帽子，帽子上两种颜色对比鲜明，这代表她的阶层。

sentences.sentence: These burials included quantities of finely carried items made of nonlocal material, denoting the high political standing of those interred.
sentences.translation: 这些墓葬包括大量由外地材料制成的精细搬运物品，表明了被埋葬者的高度政治地位。

sentences.sentence: Links have a type denoting the semantics of the link.
sentences.translation: 链接具有表示链接语义的类型。
